oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MODEL TESTS FOR EVALUATING BEACH NOURISHMENT PERFORMANCE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tondello, Massimo
Ruol, Piero
Selavo, Mauro
Capobianco, Michele
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: model test
beach nourishment
nourishment performance
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: After having shortly discussed about the nourishment fundamentals, focussing the attention on the benefits and on the factors promoting the beach fills, some specific questions on fill design, on related processes and on the temporal aspects of such beach protecting intervention were addressed and tentatively answered. In the second part, the physical-model tool, as a way for answering to the suggested questions is presented and three different case studies are discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 26 (1998): Proceedings of 26th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Copenhagen, Denmark, 1998.
